rules_text:
When Soul of the Grove enters the battlefield, mill three cards and you gain 3 life.
When Soul of the Grove dies, create a 4/1 black and green Zombie Treefolk creature token.
notes:
GW:
 - Odd MVs
 - +1/+1 counters
RG:
 - two of each land type
 - wayfarer 5c
GU:
 - five or more alternate costs
 - fathom
BG:
 - mana value 3 or greater
 - graveyard (lands)
